name: selenium_advanced_features
description: Window switching, iframe handling, cookies, and headless mode

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options; options = Options(); options.add_argument('--headless'); driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options); driver.get('https://example.com'); print(f'Headless mode: {driver.title}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Headless mode: Example Domain

Browser running in headless mode (no GUI)

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); driver.add_cookie({'name': 'test_cookie', 'value': 'cookie_value'}); cookies = driver.get_cookies(); print(f'Cookies: {len(cookies)}'); for cookie in cookies: print(f'  {cookie["name"]}: {cookie["value"]}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Cookies: 1
  test_cookie: cookie_value

Cookie added and retrieved

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/iframe'); driver.switch_to.frame(driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, 'iframe')); content = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, 'body').text; print(f'Iframe content: {content[:50]}...'); driver.switch_to.default_content(); print('Switched back to main page'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Iframe content: Your content goes here....
Switched back to main page

Iframe accessed and exited
